subject: Hello
body:
Hello
We found your CV, as you recently updated your page on Indeed.
 
You searched for IT -Support Engineer "Frankfurt am Main" and maybe you are interested in our job
offer.
We want to suggest you consider the vacancy of Customer Service Manager.
 
What exactly are we offering?
You can combine this work with any other if it does not affect the quality of accomplishment of tasks.
It is desirable to have knowledge of English at level B1.
Location: Germany
Schedule: Part-time (3-4 hours a day)
Employment Type: Work from home, Remote
Salary: 2,900 EUR a month + bonuses
If you are interested to know more about this position please email our HR Manager - Natalie Mills and she will provide details about the vacancy.
Email: 
natalie-mills@trafixfin.com
If you have not received a response from our HR Manager, please check your spam folder.
Sometimes there are problems with delivering email.
Thank you for your time. We hope for feedback shortly.
Have a nice day.
HR department
Trafix Finance Ltd

subject: Re:   Hello
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out and considering me for the position of Customer Service Manager. I'm intrigued by this opportunity, especially since it can be combined with other work.

Could you please provide more details about the job responsibilities? Also, what level of English proficiency is required for this role?

Looking forward to hearing from Natalie Mills soon.

Have a nice day too!

Best wishes,
James
